ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), not( REGEX( Employee_Number__c, "[EHT]{1}[0-9]{6}" ) ), not( REGEX( Employee_Number__c, "[U]{1}[0-9]{5}" ) ), NOT( ISBLANK( Employee_Number__c )), not($Profile.Name ='System Administrator' ),not($Profile.Name ='Developer Administrator (Non US)') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Employee Number should be either upper case E, H or T followed by 6 numbers or upper case U followed by 5 numbers.
